song.full_title: These Good People by The Gathering
song.title: These Good People
song.lyrics:
These Good People Lyrics[Verse 1]
He worries
No more than he
Necessarily needs
To fill his void

As big as space
Never ending thrill
He meets his will
By choosing hate
(Why choosing?)
Why choosing?
Need us to smile too?
Alright

[Verse 2]
Struggling to prevail (Struggling to prevail)

Foretaste (Foretaste)
The aftermath (The aftermath)
Which will be black (Which will be black)
As black as waste (As black as waste)
(Why choosing?)

[Bridge]
We'll throw in an extra dance
For just a little over 5 pence
(Why choosing?)
Need us to smile too?
Alright
(Why choosing?)
You'll turn our limo into a hearse
Weighing just enough to run it over your curse
(Why choosing?)
Need us to smile too?

(Lai lai lai)
You might also likeWhy choosing?
Why choosing?
(Ooohh)
Alright
(Why choosing?)

[Bridge]
We'll throw in an extra dance
For just a little over 5 pence
(Why choosing?)
Need us to smile too?
Alright
(Why choosing?)
You'll turn our limo into a hearse
Weighing just enough to run it over your curse
(Why choosing?)
Need us to smile too?Embed
